featured.text: Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
He first established his reputation as an illustrator in his hometown of Boston. 51.
its reputation or the test scores it requires for admission?
the reputation of a college or the test scores it requires.

definition.en_def: The beliefs or opinions that are generally held about someone or something.
definition.example: Her reputation as a skilled artist has attracted many clients.
